meanings.definition: Water falling in drops from the sky.
meanings.sent1: During the storm, the raining made everything wet.
meanings.sent2: I love watching the raining from my window.
meanings.sent3: The kids danced happily in the raining during the summer shower.
meanings.sent4: The raining outside sounded like a gentle lullaby.
meanings.sent5: The farmer hoped for more raining to help his crops grow.

meanings.sent1: Last night, it was raining heavily outside.
meanings.sent2: I hope it will be raining tomorrow for the plants.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked confused as if it was raining indoors.
meanings.sent4: The memories came back like raining emotions.
meanings.sent5: The music was so beautiful, it felt like raining melodies.

meanings.sent1: The clouds were dark, ready for raining on the fields.
meanings.sent2: The weather forecast predicted it would be raining all day.
meanings.sent3: The magician seemed to be able to control the raining during the show.
meanings.sent4: The tears were like raining down her cheeks.
meanings.sent5: The blessings seemed to be raining upon the newlyweds.
